title: Hand-Woven Wool Throw
description: Ethically sourced merino wool, hand-woven in small batches. Generous size for draping over a sofa or layering on a bed. Available in three colorways: Natural, Sage, and Charcoal.
descriptionCn: 道德采购美利奴羊毛，小批量手工编织。尺寸宽大，适合搭在沙发上或叠加在床上。提供三种颜色：自然色、鼠尾草绿和炭灰色。

seo.title: Hand-Woven Wool Throw — Julia Studio Shop
seo.description: Ethically sourced merino wool throw, hand-woven in small batches. Available in Natural, Sage, and Charcoal.
